title: Valentine
lyrics:
Yeah, yeah, yeah
Would you be? (Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah)
Would you be, yeah?
YFS
Yeah

Light skin when you curve his text (You be like, curve, skrrr)

You tryna figure out what’s next

I should've been the one you chose (One you chose)

So fine I wouldn't mind licking yours toes

All in between your legs and up your spine

Let a real nigga get you right, every night

Hey



Would you be? (Ah-ah-ah)

Would you be? (Ah-ah-ah)

My valentine? (Ah-ah-ah)

'Cause I just wanna pick up (Ah-ah-ah)

I just wanna give you love

Would you be?

Would you be my, valentine?

'Cause I just wanna pick you up

I just wanna give you love



Yeah

It could be a lituation (Yeah)

Come with me share my vibration

But not just for the night (No)

More like 365 (Yeah), more like 3 kids

When we vibe you feel the wave

Between your legs it's a dinner plate

Swimming pools in the summer bae

Hit Maldives in the winter bae

Give me your heart, don't be afraid

Won't have no size to entertain

But before I cut 'em off, tell me



Would you be? Would you be? You be (Ah-ah-ah)

Would you be? (Ah-ah-ah)

Tell me girl, my valentine? (Ah-ah-ah)

'Cause I just wanna pick up (Ah-ah-ah)

I just wanna give you love

Would you be? (I just wanna, hmm)

Would you be my, my ooh-woo, valentine? (Yeah-yeah, yeah-yeah, yeah-yeah)

'Cause I just wanna pick you up

I just wanna give you love



I, I, oh-oh, woah-oh

Hmmm
